response.original_title: Atmosfera n.2 (Carlos, Augusto, Filipe, Joel, Leandro, Paulo, Matilde, Elisabete)
response.overview: The video is about the decontextualisation of the landscape and how the image of it takes on different forms through human action. It follows the operations of a portuguese company that transports portions of the ocean home. The video also features the production of corals, images that help tell the story of how these natural landscapes, which are collapsing in nature due to climate change, are being reincarnated in our living rooms.
response.title: Atmosfera n.2 (Carlos, Augusto, Filipe, Joel, Leandro, Paulo, Matilde, Elisabete)
